Job Description:
As a Frontend Developer, you will play a key role in designing and implementing responsive, intuitive, and high-performing web applications that empower users and leverage advanced AI features.

Key Responsibilities
Build and maintain responsive, user-friendly interfaces using React, Redux , and Next.js .
Collaborate with backend developers to ensure seamless integration of APIs and AI-powered features.
Optimize web applications for performance, scalability , and usability .
Work with UX/UI designers to turn wireframes and mock-ups into engaging, interactive experiences.
Apply best practices in front-end development, emphasizing code reusability and modular design .
Debug, troubleshoot, and upgrade existing applications to maintain reliability and consistency.

Qualifications
2+ years of experience in frontend development with React, Redux, and Next.js.
Strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
Experience with state management using Redux and asynchronous data fetching.
Familiarity with version control tools like Git.
Ability to collaborate in an agile environment and communicate effectively across teams.
Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools.

Skills that give you an edge
Experience working with AI-driven features or data visualization.
Understanding of backend technologies and RESTful APIs.
Knowledge of frontend testing frameworks like Jest or Mocha.
Experience with CSS pre-processors like SASS or styled- components.

About the Company:
Sawara Solutions Pvt. Ltd. (Promilo.com) is a Bangalore-based organization connecting individuals, professionals, and organizations worldwide through product demos and image showcases. They aim to create a global community and opportunities for everyone with online business connections.
Promilo.com is a new online business community connecting people and creating new business opportunities.

We are seeking a passionate and talented Frontend Developer Intern to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will work closely with our design and development teams to build visually stunning and highly functional user interfaces for our online platforms. This opportunity is ideal for individuals eager to gain hands-on experience in frontend development and contribute to impactful projects.

Roles and Responsibilities:

Collaborate with designers and backend developers to create responsive and user-friendly web interfaces.
Develop and maintain features using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Optimize web applications for performance, scalability, and cross-browser compatibility.
Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code while adhering to best practices.

JobType: full-time
We are seeking an enthusiastic and detail-oriented Frontend Developer React Ecosystem to join our growing product engineering team. This is an excellent opportunity for someone who is passionate about building modern, high-performance mobile and web applications using React Native and ReactJS. Whether you're a recent graduate or someone with a few months of hands-on experience, we’re looking for individuals with a strong understanding of frontend development principles and a desire to grow in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

Requirements
What You'll Do:
Build intuitive and responsive user interfaces for mobile applications using React Native.
Develop dynamic web applications using ReactJS, HTML5, and CSS3.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver high-quality features.
Write clean, reusable, and well-documented code following industry best practices.
Participate in code reviews, brainstorming sessions, and team discussions to continuously improve product quality and user experience.
Identify and troubleshoot UI/UX issues and performance bottlenecks across platforms and devices.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in React and frontend technologies.
Must-Have Skills:
Strong knowledge of JavaScript (ES6+), ReactJS, and React Native.
Understanding of component-based architecture and React state management techniques (e.g., hooks, context API).
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling.
Basic understanding of mobile-first and responsive design principles.
Solid grasp of HTML5, CSS3, and cross-browser compatibility issues.
A good sense of design, UX principles, and attention to detail.
Good to Have:
Experience with version control systems like Git.
Exposure to mobile development environments (Xcode/Android Studio).
Familiarity with tools like Redux, Tailwind CSS, or Styled Components.
Experience working on personal or open-source projects using React Native or ReactJS.
Understanding of basic backend concepts (Node.js, APIs, etc.) is a plus.
Who You Are:
A self-starter who’s eager to learn and build real-world applications.
Curious, collaborative, and comfortable with problem-solving.
Open to feedback and excited to grow as a frontend engineer.
Comfortable working in a team and communicating ideas clearly.

Develop and maintain web applications using HTML, CSS, Javascript and JQuery.
Developer PHP based website using WordPress as a CMS.

Job Description:
Define, design, anddevelop business solutions through configuration and software development. Collaboratewith analysts and architects to define the technical direction. This requires adeep understanding of the business requirements that drive the analysis anddesign of these technical solutions.

You are someone who can:

Support and create engaging/modern user experiencesper stakeholder s specifications in the form of clean, W3C-compliant front-endcode. Focusing on web-standards, semantics, usability, accessibility, andoptimization, with special consideration given to code architecture, modularity,and reusability.

Testing and documentation.
Aid and advise on processes, technology, and toolsused for custom web development.
Be a point of contact for cross-functionaltechnical projects and programs. These include project/program execution,requirements gathering, technical execution and deployment.
Support platform and IT related needs, such asproduct updates and site administration.
Identify improvements within the creative marketingprocess and capabilities.

You bring in:

3 or more years of technical product and projectexperience delivering best-in-class digital media experiences, preferably aspart of a team designing, developing and managing external business websites.
3 or more years of experience as a web developer,high-level proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript. It is not enough toimplement a solution but to implement the best solution for a given context(You don t only know the how but the why).
Knowledge of UX, SEO, and performance bestpractices.
Familiarity with software repositories and othertechnical collaboration tools.
Experience with Content Management Systems (AdobeExperience Manager and Adobe Marketing Cloud tools experience preferred but notrequired).
Ability to communicate priorities, mitigateimpacts, and manage multiple technical projects especially when requirementschange as new business discoveries or industry compliance dictate.
Strong people skills working with colleagues,project management, business stakeholders and technical advisors.
Continuous curiosity and love for learning.
Limited sponsorship may be available.
Experience with JavaScript frameworks (React.js or Angular)
Experience with CSS frameworks (Bootstrap,Foundation)
Experience with CSS preprocessors (SCSS, Sass)
BEM methodology knowledge
Experience with data visualization libraries (D3.jspreferred)
SVG animation experience
Knowledge of the agile methodology

Your qualificationis:

Job Description:
About ALLEN.
After dominating the offline market of Tutoring, Allen Careers has set out to build the next big thing to happen to Education.
Allen Digital aims to build an EdTech platform to provide students with everything that a classroom cannot.
Allen Digital was created as a strategic partnership between Allen Careers Institute and Bodhi Tree Systems to ensure tech enablement for millions of students.
We are backed by some of the best names in media, business, education, and technology.
This is a start-up, which has a reputed team, strong investors, and a legacy.
If building 0 to 1 excites you and you want to work with a team of proven leaders, please reach out to us..
Key Responsibilities.
Work closely with the Product and Business teams to understand the requirements for app and website layout changes and adjustments..
Implement changes and manage the layout and functionality of the website and app, ensuring a seamless and uniform experience across.
Keep a track of all configurations and regularly update and modify widgets, banners as per course to reflect the latest relevant information, ensuring accuracy and relevance..
Regularly test and monitor the website and app for functionality, layout consistency, and performance across different browsers and devices..
Collaborate with the engineering team to troubleshoot and address any backend issues impacting frontend display or app behavior..
Be the subject matter expert on different pages, widgets and their behaviour and thus be the POC for any discussions around improving the UI/UX.
Qualifications.
2+ years of experience in website/app layout management and/or product operations.
Ability to implement and maintain precise layout configurations, ensuring the correct configs of course, streams, and content combinations..
Basic Understanding of JSON/ HTML/ APIs to make minor modifications independently.
Stakeholder and program management skills to work closely with Product, Business, and Technical teams to implement changes..
Ability to interpret user feedback and apply it to enhance the overall user experience on the platform..

Skills: Java Fullstack, Node.Js, MongoDB, React.Js, Java, Full Stack, Software
Job Description:
Roles & Responsibilities:
Full Stack Development:
Design, develop, test, and deploy scalable web applications using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and/or Angular frameworks.
Maintain front-end and back-end components and ensure seamless integration between client-side and server-side logic.
API Development & Integration:
Develop RESTful APIs and ensure robust integration with external/internal services.
Optimize APIs for maximum speed and scalability.
Database Management:
Design and manage databases using MongoDB.
Ensure high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front end.
Debugging & Troubleshooting:
Identify, troubleshoot, and resolve performance bottlenecks and bugs in both frontend and backend codebases.
Code Quality & Best Practices:
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code following industry best practices and coding standards.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing.
Agile Collaboration:
Work in an Agile/Scrum environment with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Communicate effectively with team members, stakeholders, and managers.
Version Control:
Use Git for version control and collaborate using platforms like GitHub or Bitbucket.
Continuous Learning:
Stay updated with emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends.
Preferred Candidate Profile:
Educational Background:
Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Technical Skills:
Proficient in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and modern web technologies.
Hands-on experience with MERN Stack – MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js.
Proficiency in Angular (version 8 and above).
Experience in creating and managing RESTful APIs.
Familiar with Git, GitHub, or Bitbucket for version control.
Good understanding of database concepts and working knowledge of MongoDB.

Skills: Cloud Platforms, SQL Database, API, Nosql Databases, Python Development, Ubuntu, debug, Debugging, coding, GIT, Docker, Linux, GCP, Azure Cloud, Django, Centos, AWS, Restful Web Api Development, Flask, Kubernetes
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled Python Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing, testing, and maintaining Python-based applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to build scalable and efficient solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain Python-based applications, scripts, and APIs.
Write clean, efficient, and scalable code following best practices and coding standards.
Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize applications to ensure high performance and reliability.
Integrate third-party APIs, services, and databases seamlessly into applications.
Collaborate with frontend developers, designers, and cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
Implement unit tests, write documentation, and ensure high test coverage for robust applications.
Manage and deploy applications in Linux-based environments, ensuring smooth operation and optimization.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and advancements in Python development.
Contribute to architectural decisions and participate in code reviews to ensure code quality and best practices.

Required Skills & Qualifications:
Strong proficiency in Python and its frameworks (Django, Flask, FastAPI, etc.).
Hands-on experience in building and consuming RESTful APIs and web services.
Solid understanding of SQL and NoSQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, etc.).
Proficiency in version control systems like Git and collaborative workflows (GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket).
Experience with Linux operating systems (Ubuntu, CentOS, etc.), including shell scripting, process management, and system troubleshooting.
Understanding of asynchronous programming, multi-threading, and performance optimization.
Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and cloud-native services is a plus.
Experience with containerization tools (Docker, Kubernetes) and CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments.
Understanding of security best practices, authentication, and authorization mechanisms.

Skills: Java, SOA, iOS, .net, frontend, Design Patterns, Data Structures, OOPS, Problem Solving, SDLC Life Cycle, designing, Android, coding, Communication Skills, Algorithms, Mobile Applications, Solid Principles
Job Description:
Role & responsibilities
Design and implement software solutions for an approved and assigned project which may target a new product or alternatively a major re-release of an existing product following the software development lifecycle.
Document and demonstrate solutions by developing documentation, flowcharts, layouts, diagrams, charts, code comments and clear code. Deliver on the product roadmap. Participate in technical planning and design reviews for feature development.
Build software that works well (quality), stable and secure. Understand the defined scope of the requirement / bug. Will work across multiple projects at once, looking for ways to enable collaboration.
Should learn new development constructs related to the technology used in the product with an objective to improve his/her productivity and to improve the robustness of the product.
Participating in analysis and design meetings for the Product. Work as an active and collaborative member of a Scrum team.
Participate in all scrum ceremonies with team to review Technical Design Specifications, obtain development tasks, track progress, clarify technical issues pertaining to coding and testing of the design.
Identify and implement ways to improve quality and efficiencies in the department. Strong analysis and communication skills. Able to manage conflict and misalignment within the team and with the business.
Interact with software architects and senior developers to design application modules using object-oriented design methods.
Design and develop software with high quality and take ownership. Work collaboratively in an Agile team

Preferred candidate profile
Freshers with 2023-2025 passout.
B-Tech / MTech in Computer science or Information Technology
Hands-on with Design, Coding, Debugging and Testing -Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.
Development skills and overall understanding of software development methodologies .
Very good in Algorithms, Data structures, and Time Complexities, OOPS and Design patterns.
Good communication and interpersonal skills; able to communicate technical concepts to non-technical groups .
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to assimilate new product knowledge quickly and easily.
Exhibits focus, diligence, and discipline. Ability to adapt to changes quickly and easily.
